treatment.reference: Carbon assimilation by the autotrophic thermophilic archaebacterium Thermoproteus neutrophilus Arch Microbiol 146:301-308
treatment.description: Propionate did not stimulate growth. Succinate slightly stimulated growth. Did not oxidize organic acids when grown on H2 and CO2, but used them as carbon sources. Acetate incorporated into amino acids and sugars.
